issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toUpperCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Attribute `usesCleartextTraffic` is only used in API level 23 and higher (current min is 21)
Redundant label can be removed
`testResultReceiver` is missing `RECEIVER_EXPORTED` or `RECEIVER_NOT_EXPORTED` flag for unprotected broadcasts registered for TEST_RESULT

Permission exists without corresponding hardware `<uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.telephony" required="false">` tag

The intent action `TEST_RESULT (used to send a broadcast)` matches the intent filter of a non-exported receiver, registered via a call to `Context.registerReceiver`, or similar. If you are trying to invoke this specific receiver via the action then you should use `Intent.setPackage(<APPLICATION_ID>)`.
Exported service does not require permission
Unnecessary; `SDK_INT` is always >= 21
Unnecessary; `SDK_INT` is always >= 21

Very long vector path (904 characters), which is bad for performance. Considering reducing precision, removing minor details or rasterizing vector.
